oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mid-America Mall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Trio of images featuring the Mid-America Mall.

Typed: "Mid-America Mall, downtown Memphis. Stroll along picturesque brick walkways dotted with water fountains, including the 60 foot (18.3 m) Civic Center Fountain, and enjoy frequently featured outdoor music entertainment." -- Handwritten: "1981"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mid-America Mall; Main Street; fountains;
